chapter.title: Exadel Rich Faces Visual Component Platform 2.0 and Ajax4jsf
chapter.para: Exadel Rich Faces Visual Component Platform 2.0 is an advanced framework built on the top of Ajax4jsf and used for building rich interfaces for Web applications. It adds more Ajax and UI components and includes extensive support for easy skinnability realization in UI designs.

formalpara.title: Compatibility
formalpara.para: Make sure you are using Rich Faces version 2.0 and higher, earlier versions contain built-in Ajax4jsf kernel and can't be used together with new Ajax4jsf versions.
